arts.ttl: San Diego FC End LA Galaxy's Incredible Streak: Takeaways From Victorious MLS Debut
arts.sum: San Diego FC defeated LA Galaxy 2–0 as the MLS Cup champions lose first home match since 2023.

arts.ttl: Anders Dreyer leads San Diego to win in 1st MLS game, 2-0 over defending champion LA Galaxy
arts.sum: Anders Dreyer scored two goals and San Diego FC had a successful Major League Soccer debut, beating the defending MLS Cup champion LA Galaxy 2-0 on Sunday. Getting San Diego into the league has been a long-term goal and objective,” Garber said before the game.

arts.ttl: Watch San Diego FC Score First MLS Goal After LA Galaxy's Hilarious Mistake
arts.sum: Denmark international Anders Dreyer scored San Diego FC's first-ever goal, and it's one the LA Galaxy will want back.

arts.ttl: LA Galaxy vs. San Diego FC Predicted Lineups: MLS
arts.sum: LA Galaxy kick off their MLS season against the league's newest club, San Diego FC.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Major League Soccer predictions including LA Galaxy vs. San Diego
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Major League Soccer fixtures, including LA Galaxy vs. San Diego.
